head.supplied: Melbourne Botanic Gardens ¶ Septr 8th 1862. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you, that the Honbl the Chief Secretary has approved of the "Victorian Horticultural Improvement Society" holding an e...

div.p: MS 12521 Victorian Horticultural Society records, box 3401, p. 164, La Trobe Australian Manuscripts Collection, State Library of Victoria, Melbourne.
MS is a transcription in the Society’s letter-book. See also M to J. Harris, 14 August 1862. Melbourne Botanic Gardens

I have the honor to inform you, that the Honbl the Chief Secretary has approved of the "Victorian Horticultural Improvement Society" holding an exhibition of flowers &c. at the Bot. Gardens on the 1st of November 1862 — under the usual regulations
See M to J. O'Shanassy, 3 September 1862.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be Sir

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. Mueller
M's letter was read out at the meeting of the Society held on 8 September 1862.
